main: ^<sp:50>...does it even matter? Do you even <anim:shake>remember</anim> me? Do you even remember anyone at this point?
^<sp:50>You're...you're not planning on going in there, are you?

c-0: ^<sp:50>Heh. You <anim:wave>have to</anim>, huh? Finally some conviction, then?
c-1: ^<sp:50>I see. It's come to that, then.
g-0: ^<sp:50>And, you do realize what will happen if you go in, don't you?

c-2: ^<sp:50>Good. Not like I was going to stop you anyways.
c-3: ^<sp:50>There's no coming back if you do this. I'm sure you know that.

g-1: ^<sp:50>I won't keep you. I'm sure you remember how to enter. The temple awaits.
